website_summaries.verdict: Tretorn recreated their classic Nylite a notch higher by revamping it with an elevated cut while keeping most of the classic details. The Nylite HI7 features premium materials with an excellent comfort that can be matched with other more expensive brands.Many reviewers appreciated the affordability of this kick while providing an upgraded look in one's usual everyday ensemble. However, few buyers pointed out the lacking ventilation which makes this sneaker not recommendable during the sweltering days.
pros: Most of the respondents loved the unmatched comfort of the Nylite Hi7 sneaker
Shoppers can purchase this at a budget-friendly price
A couple of buyers declared that this shoe is a smart alternative to the pricier Nike shoes
The sole of this model is incredibly flexible, said few reviewers
Some purchasers commended the soft suede upper of their Tretorn Nylite 7 High
One user cited that this kick upgrades his usual casual look into a more striking and luxurious look
Many enjoyed the light weight of this kick
The Tretorn Nylite HI7 is offered in multiple colorways
Few buyers delightedly shared that this kick has an abundant amount of cushioning
cons: A couple of disappointed buyers disclosed that this kick has insufficient ventilation that makes it uncomfortable to wear during hot days
Few buyers found the Tretorn Nylite HI7 is a tad wider than their other Tretorn sneakers

customer_reviews.title: What a surprise! Very nice sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I came across these on the off chance on another site, but ordered them from here since they were on sale. They are very comfortable sneakers from Sweden (check their site out) . I like the design and I like that you get a pair a leather laces to match the logo's color of you want to change the laces. Very nice sneakers and another alternative to wearing those overpriced Nikes (ugh!) I have a feeling that these will catch on just like the palladium boots did.
customer_reviews.author: Evil Pink Pony

customer_reviews.title: Best Casual Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I only bought this brand of shoes because my first pair I ever bought was at Century21 about 15 years ago, and I wear them all the time even till this day. I definitely love how they look and feel and the only negative remark is not with the shoes but with the fact it took me 15 years to buy more... Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Supernino_75

customer_reviews.title: useful cool swedish tech
customer_reviews.text: tretorn are radical old-new swedish style with cool fun for all who own them. make ice fishing fashionable or wear them to your swedish massage hut. hey, no complaints, friends. with blue suede swedish technology under foot, it's good times for feet. i especially wear mine with speedo when sport sailing. you do whatever in yours... firewood log chopping in wooded areas or walking to city concerts among friend groups, they're great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's your shoe from the 80s, but better
customer_reviews.text: Nice feel, comfy wear, sized just right. Head turner and double taker on this very unique and retro style shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Andre dlC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dad wanted to order these because he liked them. He has worn them already
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this pair of shoes. One of my favorites in my collection!
customer_reviews.author: PopAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Order a half size down
customer_reviews.text: I love Tretorn shoes and own a few pairs; so I know they are narrower than others and I need to order at least a half size down.
customer_reviews.author: Pequliar

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color and super soft
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased as a gift for my husband. The color is great and the suede is so soft. Husband says they are really comfy and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thin backing on the Suede section of the shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I just got these last night. The suede part of the shoe feels pretty thin, like there isn't much backing, but I got these shoes as a 'nicer' pair to wear and not something I'd wear every day. These look and feel awesome. I love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stylish looking and comfortable. Not meant for adverse conditions or normal wear.
customer_reviews.author: MJC

customer_reviews.title: Nice but run large.
customer_reviews.text: Nice but larger than any other pair of Tretorns I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: tony stokes

customer_reviews.title: Steal these comfy/stylish shoe
customer_reviews.text: Insaw these in sale while shopping and checked amazons price, unbelievable deal! So I got to try them on and see them first before buying.More than half off the $110 retail! Get them while you can
customer_reviews.author: MickOC

product_meta.title: TRETORN Mens Nylite Hi7 Nylite Hi7
